title: Machine Learning Model Adoption and Organizational Learning Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course where learners experience and study the decision-support process of machine learning models in a virtual environment based on real business scenarios.

learning_goals: In simulation environments, learners can interpret machine learning model predictions and apply them to business decision-making.
Based on explainable data generated by models, learners can facilitate collaborative discussions within teams.
Learners can analyze the correlation between data quality and model performance to establish continuous learning strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
